title: Your Lie in April

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Lead Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA
awardEventDetails.description: Erica Lindbeck (As the voice of "Kaori Miyazono".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Vocal Ensemble in an Anime Television Series/OVA
awardEventDetails.description: Max Mittelman - Erica Lindbeck - Erica Mendez - Kyle McCarley - Erika Harlacher - Erik Scott Kimerer - Carrie Keranen - Wendee Lee - Dorothy Elias-Fahn - Stephanie Sheh

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Lead Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA
awardEventDetails.description: Erica Lindbeck (As the voice of "Kaori Miyazono".)

awardsHtml:
2 wins & 3 nominations

Behind the Voice Actors Awards

2017 Winner BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
Best Female Lead Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA
Erica Lindbeck (As the voice of "Kaori Miyazono".)
2017 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
Best Vocal Ensemble in an Anime Television Series/OVA
Max Mittelman - Erica Lindbeck - Erica Mendez - Kyle McCarley - Erika Harlacher - Erik Scott Kimerer - Carrie Keranen - Wendee Lee - Dorothy Elias-Fahn - Stephanie Sheh
2017 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
Best Female Lead Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA
Erica Lindbeck (As the voice of "Kaori Miyazono".)
